news.title: Southend airport to remain closed after fireball plane crash
news.summary: Eyewitnesses describe seeing the plane "bank heavily" shortly after take-off.

news.title: Dubious sales tactics at two leading estate agencies uncovered by BBC investigation
news.summary: Undercover filming and whistleblower testimony reveals how commission is put ahead of customers.

news.title: Bank of England prepared to cut rates if job market slows, says governor
news.summary: Andrew Bailey tells the Times "I really do believe the path is downward" on interest rates.

news.title: Woman smuggled baby into UK using fake birth story
news.summary: A baby will be placed for adoption in UK after being trafficked from Nigeria. She may never know her real parents.

news.title: 'Royal peace talks' and 'Sinner takes it all'
news.summary: Monday's front pages are dominated by Italian tennis player Jannik Sinner's Wimbledon win.

news.title: Aviation authority says Boeing fuel switches are safe after Air India crash
news.summary: A preliminary investigation found the switches had been turned off in June's fatal Air India crash.

news.title: At least 30 killed in sectarian clashes in Syria
news.summary: Government forces would directly intervene to resolve the conflict and halt the clashes, Syria's interior ministry said.

news.title: Tube fare evasion prosecutions highest since 2019
news.summary: The number of prosecutions for fare evasion is at its highest level for six years, figures show.

news.title: Four times more online abuse of Wimbledon players detected
news.summary: Nearly four times as much online abuse aimed at players during the first half of Wimbledon was detected compared to the same period in 2024, according to data shared exclusively with the BBC.
